title: Restyle enter gate with heart animations, improve Final page readability, and reduce YES button size

requirements.text: Update Page 3 (Final page) so the long message text and the signature are pure white and easy to read: remove the shimmer/shine animation from the message, keep the existing fonts, and ensure the signature uses the same font as before but is also pure white.

quotes: All text pure white with same font along with signature
on page 3 those tax is not readable remove the shine and and make them just White and easy to read

acceptanceCriteria: On /final, the long message is rendered in solid white (no shimmer/metallic/shine animation).
On /final, the signature “- YOUR ARSU” is rendered in solid white and retains its existing font family styling.
Page 3 remains vertically scrollable and preserves existing line breaks (whitespace-pre-wrap behavior remains intact).

requirements.text: Make the Page 2 “YES” button slightly smaller while keeping the existing romantic styling (same colors, rounded shape, hover behavior, and general look).

quotes: on page to make yes button little smaller

acceptanceCriteria: On /proposal, the YES button is visibly smaller than before (reduced padding and/or font size), while retaining the same styling and hover/transition behavior.

requirements.text: Restyle the pre-Page-1 “Enter the Website” gate screen to feel more love/Valentine-themed using love colors and animated hearts, while keeping the same gate behavior (user must click/tap to enter the site).

quotes: Restyle with love colours and animation like heart
make intro in love them which is now just shows enter the website in white colour and Balck background

acceptanceCriteria: Before entering the site, the gate screen shows a love-themed visual style (romantic/love colors) rather than a plain black/white appearance.
The gate screen includes heart-themed animation(s) visible on both desktop and mobile.
Clicking/tapping “Enter the Website” still dismisses the gate and reveals the existing 3-page flow unchanged.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components must be composed, not modified).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts).
Keep the existing full-screen background rendering rules: background-size contain (letterbox), centered, no-repeat, with a black translucent overlay.
Backend remains single-actor Motoko; do not introduce additional backend services or external databases.
Use English for any user-facing text changed/added as part of these updates.
nonGoals: Re-enabling or adding background music/audio playback.
Changing routing structure beyond what is required for the styling updates.
Changing or regenerating the three background images beyond the already-established asset replacement/mapping behavior.
